content: ** cont until armhole meas 6 7 7 7 7 cm for all sizes ending with rs facing for next row shape front neck next row k17 19 19 20 22 23 turn and leave rem 34 38 40 41 43 44 sts on a holder work each side of neck separately decrease 1 st at neck edge of next 4 4 4 4 5 5 row 13 15 15 16 17 18 sts work 1 1 1 3 2 4 row ending with rs facing for next row work should now meas 8 9 9 10 10 11 cm the last 2cm needed to match the back are formed by the shoulder buttonband shape shoulder next row cast off 6 7 7 8 8 9 sts knit to end work 1 row cast off rem 7 8 8 8 9 9 sts with rs facing cast off 17 19 21 21 21 21 sts for front neck back rejoin yarn to rem sts and knit to end using 2 75mm needles cast on 65 73 75 77 81 83 sts decrease 1 st at neck edge of next 4 4 4 4 5 5 row 13 15 15 16 17 18 sts row 1 rs k1 * p1 k1 repeat from * to end work 2 2 2 4 3 5 row ending with ws facing for next row row 2 * p1 k1 repeat from * to last st p1 work should now meas 8 9 9 10 10 11 cm these 2 row set rib shape shoulder work 4 4 4 4 6 6 row more in rib ending with rs facing for next row cast off 6 7 7 8 8 9 sts purl to end next row work 1 row change to 3 25mm needles cast off rem 7 8 8 8 9 9 sts row 1 and 2 knit row 3 p1 * k1 p1 repeat from * to end sleeves row 4 * k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 using 2 75mm needles and a cast on 33 37 37 39 41 43 sts row 5 and 6 knit row 1 rs k1 * p1 k1 repeat from * to end row 7 k1 * p1 k1 repeat from * to end row 2 * p1 k1 repeat from * to last st p1 row 8 * p1 k1 repeat from * to last st p1 these 2 row set rib these 8 row set patt work 4 row more in rib ending with rs facing for next row cont in patt as set until work meas approx 6 6 7 8 8 9 cm change to 3 25mm needles ending with row 1 or 5 of patt and ws facing for next row beg with a k row and working in st st throughout increase 1 st at next row knit to end and at same time decrease 1 st at each each end of 3rd and 0 4
